statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT username, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE 'johndoe%' ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT username, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND account_balance < 500 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie') AND account_balance > 0 ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' OR username = 'superuser';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY permission_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC
SELECT username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_id = 5;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN roles_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = roles_permissions.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';

SELECT u.username, r.role_id, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(rp.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%a%';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles_mapping ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles_mapping m ON u.user_id = m.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON m.role_id = r.role_id;

SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles_mapping rm ON u.user_id = rm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions_mapping pm ON rm.role_id = pm.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON pm.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles_mapping rm ON u.user_id = rm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions_mapping pm ON rm.role_id = pm.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON pm.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
